Welcome to Park City, Utah

Your Gateway to Year-Round Mountain Adventures

Start Exploring

Explore Park City

From world-class skiing to scenic hiking trails, Park City offers endless adventures for every season.

Skiing & Snowboarding

Experience 7,300+ acres of world-class terrain across Park City Mountain and Deer Valley resorts. Perfect powder, groomed runs, and terrain parks await.

Explore Skiing

Hiking & Trails

Discover 400+ miles of scenic trails ranging from leisurely walks to challenging summit hikes. Experience breathtaking mountain vistas and wildlife.

Find Trails

Mountain Biking

Ride epic singletrack through aspen groves and alpine meadows. From flow trails to technical descents, Park City is a mountain biking paradise.

Hit the Trails

Dining & Nightlife

Savor everything from slope-side dining to Main Street's award-winning restaurants. Enjoy craft cocktails, local brews, and vibrant nightlife.

Explore Dining

Events & Festivals

Experience world-renowned events like Sundance Film Festival, concerts at Deer Valley, and year-round cultural celebrations.

See Calendar

Where to Stay

Find your perfect mountain retreat from luxury resorts to cozy condos. Ski-in/ski-out properties, boutique hotels, and vacation rentals.

Find Lodging

Why Choose Park City?

  • Two world-class ski resorts with 7,300+ acres of terrain
  • 400+ miles of hiking and biking trails
  • Historic Main Street with 100+ restaurants and shops
  • Just 35 minutes from Salt Lake City International Airport
  • 300+ days of sunshine per year
  • Home to Sundance Film Festival and Olympic venues
  • Year-round events and festivals
  • Family-friendly activities for all ages

    Seasonal Highlights

    Winter (Dec-Mar)

    Prime skiing conditions with 350+ inches of annual snowfall. Enjoy snowboarding, snowshoeing, sleigh rides, and cozy apr√®s-ski scenes.

    • World-class skiing & snowboarding
    • Sundance Film Festival (January)
    • Winter sports & activities

    Summer (Jun-Aug)

    Perfect weather for outdoor adventures. Mountain biking, hiking, fly fishing, and scenic gondola rides with wildflower-covered mountains.

    • Mountain biking paradise
    • Hiking & trail running
    • Outdoor concerts & festivals

    Fall (Sep-Nov)

    Stunning fall foliage transforms the mountains. Ideal hiking weather, harvest festivals, and fewer crowds make autumn magical.

    • Spectacular fall colors
    • Perfect hiking weather
    • Wine & food festivals
